Detailed Description

Packet to request disturbance information for specified nodes.

Table begins at REQUEST_HEADER_SIZE.
PosSizeComment
0 2 bytes Number of nodes in the request
2 2 bytes Current Map pos
4 2 bytes Current Node pos
4 4 bytes NumberOfMaps
8 4 bytes FirstMapID
12 4 bytes NumberOfNodes on map
16 4 bytes NodeID

Definition at line 51 of file DisturbanceInfoPacket.h.
